post:
We've upped our RAM and Storage for all our packages and brought back our 50% off code for a limited time only.

Here is the deal:

VMware VPS
**750MB** Dedicated RAM (was 512MB)
**30GB** Raid10 Storage (was 20GB)
2 CPU Cores
100Mbit connectivity
VSphere Control Panel (Upon Request)
Complimentary Weekly Backups

Order here : [corgitech.com/linux_vps.html](http://corgitech.com/linux_vps.html) with Coupon : **CORGI50**
The Coupon code will work on all packages and operating systems but not addons.

We can mount any Linux ISO you wish (FreeBSD, Fedora etc..) that aren't listed on our page. We don't oversell.

Locations Available : UK, Netherlands, NY/NJ, Texas, LA. All have IPv6 except Texas.
Test IP's and Files available at the bottom of our VPS Page: [corgitech.com/linux_vps.html](http://corgitech.com/linux_vps.html)

We have a fair number of reviews on LEB/LET and WHT please do search. Here are a few:

[lowendbox.com/blog/corgi-tech-6-512mb-vmware-vps-in-uk/](http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/corgi-tech-6-512mb-vmware-vps-in-uk/)
[webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1163987](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1163987)
[webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1154520](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1154520)
[webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1139007](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1139007)

[webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1109608](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1109608)
[webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1119773](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1119773)

Availability is limited and we'll likely be sold out at a couple of the locations within 72 hours. We'll remove sold out locations from our order page when they are out of stock.

**Terms:**
IRC , Anonymous Proxies, Medium to Heavy Video Encoding, Seedboxes etc... are not permitted. Offer is valid for existing customers but for new orders only where existing services are not cancelled. You cannot use your own Windows License / ISO.
